subject: Decisions and Verdicts
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: USA Boxing’s judicial committee on Monday upheld the organization’s decision to bar Luis Yanez from the Olympic team. Yanez, a light flyweight, is expected to appeal to an independent arbitrator this week, hoping for a decision before his eight teammates leave for China next week. Yanez was kicked off the roster July 1 for missing more than three weeks of workouts at the team’s residency training program in Colorado Springs.
